com.pasdam.regexren.controller

Class PreferenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pasdam.regexren.controller.PreferenceManager

  • public class PreferenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Preferences manager. It allows to store and loads preferences. Moreover it allows to get notified when a preference changes.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    paco

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String LAST_SCRIPT_FILE
      Name of the default script file, saved on application exit

      • setPreviousFilter

        public void setPreviousFilter(int filter,
                              boolean showHidden)
        Set the ID of the last filter used
        Parameters:
        filter - the ID of the filter to save; values different from fields of FilterManager will be ignored
        showHidden - indicates whether the filter should accept hidden files
